Uses of Package
com.microsoft.azure.management.sql

  • Packages that use com.microsoft.azure.management.sql 
    Package Description
    com.microsoft.azure.management.sql
    This package contains the sql management class, interface, and associated configuration and utility classes.
  • Classes in com.microsoft.azure.management.sql used by com.microsoft.azure.management.sql 
    Class and Description
    AuditingPolicyOperations
    Represents all the operations to manage Azure SQL Database and Database Server Audit policy.
    CapabilitiesOperations
    Represents all the operations for determining the set of capabilites available in a specified region.
    DatabaseActivationOperations
    Represents all the operations for operating pertaining to activation on Azure SQL Data Warehouse databases.
    DatabaseBackupOperations
    Represents all the operations for operating on Azure SQL Database restore points.
    DatabaseOperations
    Represents all the operations for operating on Azure SQL Databases.
    DataMaskingOperations
    Represents all the operations for operating on Azure SQL Database data masking.
    ElasticPoolOperations
    Represents all the operations for operating on Azure SQL Database Elastic Pools.
    FirewallRuleOperations
    Represents all the operations for operating on Azure SQL Database Server Firewall Rules.
    RecommendedElasticPoolOperations
    Represents all the operations for operating on Azure SQL Recommended Elastic Pools.
    RecommendedIndexOperations
    Represents all the operations for managing recommended indexes on Azure SQL Databases.
    ReplicationLinkOperations
    Represents all the operations for operating on Azure SQL Database Replication Links.
    SecureConnectionPolicyOperations
    Represents all the operations for managing Azure SQL Database secure connection.
    SecurityOperations
    Represents all the operations for operating on Azure SQL Database security policy.
    ServerAdministratorOperations
    Represents all the operations for operating on Azure SQL Server Active Directory Administrators.
    ServerOperations
    Represents all the operations for operating on Azure SQL Database Servers.
    ServerUpgradeOperations
    Represents all the operations for Azure SQL Database Server Upgrade
    ServiceObjectiveOperations
    Represents all the operations for operating on Azure SQL Database Service Objectives.
    ServiceTierAdvisorOperations
    Represents all the operations for operating on service tier advisors.
    SqlManagementClient
    The Windows Azure SQL Database management API provides a RESTful set of web services that interact with Windows Azure SQL Database services to manage your databases.
    SqlManagementClientImpl
    The Windows Azure SQL Database management API provides a RESTful set of web services that interact with Windows Azure SQL Database services to manage your databases.
    TransparentDataEncryptionOperations
    Represents all the operations of Azure SQL Database Transparent Data Encryption.
